TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NegotiateStream extends System.Net.Security.AuthenticatedStream

summary.span: 提供資料流，該資料流會在用戶端與伺服器之間的通訊中，使用交涉安全性通訊協定驗證用戶端，並選擇性地驗證伺服器。

span.span: Provides a stream that uses the Negotiate security protocol to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in client-server communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別進行驗證，並協助保護資訊的用戶端與伺服器之間傳輸。Use the class for authentication and to help secure information transmitted between a client and a server. 使用，您可以執行下列。Using , you can do the following. - 傳送至伺服器的用戶端的認證模擬或委派。Send the client's credentials to the server for Impersonation or Delegation. - 要求伺服器驗證。Request server authentication. - 加密及/或簽署資料在傳輸之前。Encrypt and/or sign data before transmitting it. 傳輸資訊前，必須執行驗證。Authentication must be performed before transmitting information. 用戶端要求驗證使用同步方法會封鎖，直到完成驗證，或非同步方法，不會封鎖等候完成驗證。Clients request authentication using the synchronous methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous methods, which do not block while waiting for the authentication to complete. 伺服器要求驗證使用同步或非同步方法。Servers request authentication using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 用戶端，並選擇性地在伺服器上，會透過驗證交涉安全性通訊協定。The client, and optionally the server, is authenticated using the Negotiate security protocol. 在 Windows 95/98 系統上 Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) 是用於驗證的通訊協定。On Windows 95/98 systems, Windows NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is the protocol used for authentication. Kerberos 的其他平台上通訊協定用於驗證用戶端和伺服器都支援; 如果否則會使用 NTLM。On other platforms the Kerberos protocol is used for authentication if both client and server support it; otherwise NTLM is used. 如需這些通訊協定的詳細描述，請參閱 Platform SDK 文件 MSDN msdn.microsoft.com/library/。For detailed descriptions of these protocols, see the Platform SDK documentation on MSDN, at msdn.microsoft.com/library/. 類別本身會執行使用安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI) 驗證。The class performs the authentication using the Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI). 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查和屬性，以便判斷哪些安全性服務將使用來協助保護您的資料在傳輸期間。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services will be used by the to help secure your data during transmission. 請檢查屬性來判斷是否發生過相互驗證。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 您可以從中取得資訊的遠端用戶端或伺服器使用屬性。You can get information about the remote client or server using the property. 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you will receive an or a . 在此情況下，您可以重試與不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. 您將使用同步的資料傳送或非同步方法。You send data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 接收資料，使用同步或非同步方法。You receive data using the synchronous or asynchronous methods. 如果安全性服務，例如啟用加密或簽章，這些會自動套用到資料的。If security services such as encryption or signing are enabled, these are automatically applied to your data by the . 會將使用您在建立時提供的資料流的資料傳輸。The transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the . 當您提供此基礎資料流時，您可以指定是否關閉也會關閉基礎資料流。When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the also closes the underlying stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用戶端與伺服器連接的用戶端。The following code example demonstrates the client side of a client-server connection that uses the . 用戶端驗證，並以非同步方式將訊息傳送到伺服器。The client authenticates and sends a message to the server asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#0)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用戶端與伺服器連接的伺服器端驗證用戶端和讀取用戶端所傳送的訊息。The following code example demonstrates the server side of a client-server connection that uses the to authenticate the client and read a message sent by the client. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證會使用用戶端。The authentication uses the client's . 不指定伺服器的任何服務主要名稱 (SPN)。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模擬等級是，安全性層級是，並要求相互驗證。The impersonation level is , the security level is , and mutual authentication is requested. 類別將會建構使用相互驗證的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 當驗證成功時，您必須檢查和屬性，以便判斷哪些安全性服務由。When authentication succeeds, you must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 請檢查屬性來判斷是否發生過相互驗證。Check the property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred. 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在此情況下，您可以重試與不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

summary.span: 由用戶端呼叫以開始非同步作業，以便驗證用戶端與伺服器連接中的用戶端，並選擇性地驗證伺服器。

span.span: Called by clients to begin an asynchronous operation to authenticate the client, and optionally the server, in a client-server connection.

summary.span: 這個方法不會封鎖。

span.span: This method does not block.

returns.span: 物件，指出非同步作業的狀態。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證會使用用戶端。The authentication uses the client's . 不指定伺服器的任何服務主要名稱 (SPN)。No Service Principal Name (SPN) is specified for the server. 模擬等級是，和安全性層級是。The impersonation level is , and the security level is . 類別將會建構使用相互驗證的 SPN。The class will construct the SPN used for mutual authentication. 這個方法是非同步，而且不會封鎖在作業完成時。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 完成非同步的驗證作業，藉由呼叫方法。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在此情況下，您可以重試與不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法來開始非同步的驗證用戶端。The following code example demonstrates calling this method to begin an asynchronous authentication for the client. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`requiredProtectionLevel`參數，以使用已驗證的資料流傳輸資料的要求安全性服務。Use the `requiredProtectionLevel` parameter to request security services for data transmitted using the authenticated stream. 例如，若要進行加密及簽署的資料，請指定值。For example, to have the data encrypted and signed, specify the value. 成功驗證不保證，要求已被授與。Successful authentication does not guarantee that, the requested has been granted. 您必須檢查和屬性，以便判斷哪些安全性服務由。You must check the and properties to determine what security services are used by the . 這個方法是非同步，而且不會封鎖在作業完成時。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation completes, use one of the method overloads. 完成非同步的驗證作業，藉由呼叫方法。The asynchronous authentication operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 如果驗證失敗時，您會收到或。If the authentication fails, you receive an or an . 在此情況下，您可以重試與不同的認證驗證。In this case, you can retry the authentication with a different credential.

MemberSignature.Value: public override IAsyncResult BeginRead (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginRead(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, class System.AsyncCallback asyncCallback, object asyncState) cil managed
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginRead(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ asyncCallback, System::Object ^ asyncState);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 陣列，接收從資料流中讀取的位元組。

span.span: A array that receives the bytes read from the stream.

param.name: offset
param.span: 「緩衝區」中以零為起始的位置，用來開始儲存從此資料流讀取的資料。

span.span: The zero-based location in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from this stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 自資料流中讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read from the stream.

param.name: asyncCallback
param.span: 委派，其會參考讀取作業完成時要叫用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the read operation is complete.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 包含讀取作業資訊的使用者定義物件。

span.span: A user-defined object containing information about the read operation.

param.span: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 asyncCallback 委派。

span.span: This object is passed to the asyncCallback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 開始非同步讀取作業，這個作業會從資料流中讀取資料並將其儲存於指定的陣列中。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation that reads data from the stream and stores it in the specified array.

returns.span: 物件，指出非同步作業的狀態。

span.span: An object indicating the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用加密、 簽署或加密和簽章，讀取的作業會從基礎資料流讀取資料、 檢查資料完整性和加以解密。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, the read operation reads the data from the underlying stream, checks the integrity of the data, and decrypts it. 如果沒有安全性服務，例如資料加密或簽章是使用中，此方法會啟動在基礎資料流非同步讀取的作業。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous read operation on the underlying stream. 這個方法是非同步，而且不會封鎖在作業完成時。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖的作業完成之前，請使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 非同步讀取的作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 類別不支援多個同時進行讀取作業。The class does not support multiple simultaneous read operations. 如果您嘗試啟動另一個讀取作業已經在執行相同的資料流讀取的作業擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to start a read operation while another read operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 已成功驗證之前，無法呼叫此方法。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要驗證，請呼叫其中一種， ， ，或方法。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何開始非同步的讀取的作業。The following code example demonstrates starting an asynchronous read operation. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncServer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CPP/NclNegoAsyncServer.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoAsyncServer/CS/server.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用加密、 簽署或加密和簽章，這個方法從緩衝區讀取資料、 加密、 簽章或加密並加以簽署，和傳輸使用基礎資料流。If encryption, signing, or encryption and signing are enabled, this method reads the data from buffer, encrypts, signs, or encrypts and signs it, and transmits it using the underlying stream. 如果沒有安全性服務，例如資料加密或簽章是使用中，此方法會啟動在基礎資料流上的非同步寫入作業。If no security services such as data encryption or signing are in use, this method starts an asynchronous write operation on the underlying stream. 這個方法是非同步，而且不會封鎖在作業完成時。This method is asynchronous and does not block while the operation completes. 若要封鎖的作業完成之前，請使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 非同步讀取的作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous read operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 類別不支援多個同時進行寫入作業。The class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations. 如果您嘗試啟動另一個寫入作業已經在執行相同的資料流的寫入作業擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to start a write operation while another write operation is already executing on the same stream, a exception will be thrown. 已成功驗證之前，無法呼叫此方法。You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated. 若要驗證，請呼叫其中一種， ， ，或方法。To authenticate, call one of the , , , or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何開始執行非同步的寫入作業。The following code example demonstrates beginning an asynchronous write operation. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#3)] 作業完成時，會呼叫下列方法。The following method is called when the operation completes.
